raw_comment: In this graph I notice that there is more colored players then coaches of color. I wonder why there is more players of color then coaches. I don’t think this has any impact on me nor my community because the ethnicity of other people doesn’t matter nor does it affect me as it shouldn’t matter. In this graph it shows the percentage of colored people on the teams. There is more colored players than there are coaches.
ace_sentences: In this graph, there are more players of color than coaches of color.
I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color.
I think that this situation has no impact on me.
I think that this situation has no impact on my community.
The ethnicity of other people does not matter to me.
The ethnicity of other people does not affect me.
In this graph, the percentage of people of color on the teams is shown.
There are more players of color than coaches of color.
